channel.description: Recent content in Math on Harry's Blog

item.title: The Four Color Theorem
item.description: At the end of Stanford Math Camp (SUMaC), it’s a tradition that students will give a research presentation on a topology-related topic that they are interested in. This year, I teamed up with Nanxi and Ben, and we tackled the Four Color Theorem. Below is the presentation that we made. Four_Color_Theorem_SUMaC_2022-2.pdf
